Text:
I know you work very hard to upload this rips in time, but why are they so large in size?

(V) resolution is 720x480, 29.97fps 
(A) 448kbps, 44.1kHz

I don't see how the size of the file can be more than 60MB?
About a year ago I did switch to xvid files which were smaller files and got a lot of complaints because everyone liked the 720x480 files better even though they were a larger file size.
Great Rip... Big Thanks For ALL The Videos!
